Title: Sorry, Thanks
Director: Soon-rye Lim, Jeom-gyoon Oh, Heung-sik Park, Il-gon Song
Actors: Seo-Hyeon Ahn, Ji-ho Kim, Young-min Kim, Tae-hwa Seo
Plot: "Sorry, Thanks" is an omnibus film containing four short films. The central theme is the relationship between pets and their owners. In Heung-Sik Park's "My Younger Brother" a 6-year-old ...
